definition[0]: in a way that is intended for anyone to know, see, or hear
example[0]: She and her family agreed never to discuss the matter publicly.
definition[1]: done or controlled by the government
definition[2]: a company that is publicly owned has sold its shares to people who are not part of the company
definition[3]: involving the ordinary people in a country or city
definition[4]: if a company is publicly held or publicly owned, or its shares are publicly traded, its shares are available to be bought and sold by investors
example[3]: the annual reports that publicly held companies send to their shareholders
example[4]: Abbey National converted from a building society into a publicly listed company.
